source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a time-lapse scenery shot of a public square featuring an ornate white monument. The camera moves forward and tilts up towards the monument as the clouds are seen moving rapidly across the sky. The scene contrasts the traditional architecture of the monument with a modern skyscraper under construction in the background.
